name: Call of Ducky (PeterSavage)
description:
A 2.5D duck action shooter, Call of Ducky. Play as a duck fending off waves of humans in order to survive.

Project Details

The game was built for the Create Chester Game Jam 2020 in order to meet the theme of One Mechanic. The game was developed over a period of 55 hours with multiple students helping out to create it. This was one of the several game jams throughout the year that The University of Chester runs and allows for multiple year groups to mix to form teams of varying skill levels.

Controls

  • W - Up
  • A - Left
  • S - Down
  • D - Right
  • Mouse - Rotate
  • Controller - Left stick to move
  • Controller - Right stick to rotate

Requirements

  • Windows PC

Team Members

  • Emilia Smith
  • Peter Savage
  • Jason Campbell
  • Lilith Harwood
  • Joshua Batey
  • Harry Jones
